body.name: Cook N Home Nonstick Saute Fry Pan Skillet Set, 8, 9.5, and 11-Inch Kitchen Cooking Frying Saute Pan, Induction Compatible, Turquoise, 3-Piece

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Cook N Home Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 55 mins
features: 【Non-Stick Fry Pan Set】Nonstick Saute Fry Pan Set 3-Piece, Turquoise, Includes: 8-inch, 9.5-inch, and 11-Inch Nonstick Frying Pans.

【Good Heat Conduction】Nonstick Saute Frying Pan Set, made of thick gauge durable aluminum that provides quick and even heat conduction and prevents hot spots. Flat, wide, and thick bottom for a large cooking surface that is multi-purpose and keeps temperature.
【Excellent Non-Stick Performance】 With a cadmium and lead free non-stick coating, our non-stick cookware is ideal for easy food release, cleaning and healthy cooking.
【Stay-Cool Handle】Handles are stay-cool and comfortable, riveted for added strength and are wide with a hole for hanging.
【Works on All Stovetops】Suitable for all stovetops. Induction compatible; works on: gas, electric, glass, ceramic, halogen, etc. Oven safe up to 350°F. Dishwasher safe.
body.description: Get excellent performance and durability in cooking with the Cook N Home 3-Piece 8, 9.5, and 11-Inch Non-stick Saute Omelet Fry Pan Skillet Set, Turquoise, 20/24/28 cm. Made of thick gauge aluminum that provides even and quick heat conduction and prevents hot spots. Nonstick coating makes food release, cleaning, flipping, and tossing easy and allows for healthy cooking. Long riveted handle with hole for hanging is comfortable to hold, stays cool, and non-slip; oven safe to 350°F. Flat, wide, and thick bottom for a large cooking surface, is multipurpose, and keeps temperature. Flared sides for pouring, stirring, and sliding food out. Induction compatible. Works on: gas, electric, glass, halogen, ceramic, glass etc. Dishwasher safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful performing cookware!
reviews.reviewText: This cookware is beautiful to look at, but even more importantly, it cooks everything perfectly! The cookware is compact in size, lightweight and easy to hold, and the solid, thick metal plate on the bottoms heats very fast and evenly. It is easy to wash, also. The bolts that join the handles to the cookware are coated with the same nonstick coating as the pans, so that food will not build up on them either. The smooth, rounded metal rims of the pans prevent scratches and food buildup, as well. I have owned many sets of cookware in my life, but these are certainly the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love them! Cooks evenly & nothing sticks!
reviews.reviewText: I love my new pots and pans! They cook evenly, nothing sticks and they wipe clean easily. I got the red set and they are beautiful! The price is reasonable also. I handwash them to maintain the surface. They are dishwasher safe though. I highly recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These heat amazing, easy to clean up, cook great, and look great. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The color and price 👌
reviews.reviewText: I love the color! The quality seems to be great too. I just started cooking with them a couple of days ago, hence the four stars. So far so good. Great price. It goes perfectly with my teal themed kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATE....I was wrong....these pans are definitely worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Inexpensive three pan set. The good.....comfortable handle, sturdy, so far easy to clean. The bad.....storing pans in a drawer and already little chips off the turquoise finish. But the feature I like the least is the center of the pans have a slight dome so if you first put some cooking oil into the pans it puddles around the edge and doesn't come in contact with the food you want to cook. I would not buy again. (see updates below)UPDATE.....have used these pans now for several months and find that the non-stick surface is still intact and working great. The small dings in the pans from storing in a drawer are of no consequence and the pooling of cooking oil along the edge when the pan heats up is really of no concern. For the price these pans are a good deal. It is unfair to compare them to expensive high end pans, which they are not, but they are certainly serviceable and my recommendation has changed from "not buy again" to "would buy again."UPDATE.....It has been over two years now and we are still using these pans. The non-stick surface has held up great (we only use plastic spatulas/spoons) and while initially skeptical of their durability I have to say this three pan set is an exceptional deal. I definitely would purchase again. They continue to perform just like new.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Stylish and Efficient Cookware Set that Won't Break the Bank!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Cook N Home 02588 Stay Cool Nonstick Cookware Set in Turquoise, and I must say, I couldn't be happier with my purchase! Not only does the set look fantastic, but it also performs exceptionally well in my kitchen. Here are some key points:Color and DesignThe turquoise color gives a unique and refreshing look that brightens up my kitchen space. The color hasn't faded or chipped, maintaining its vibrant appearance even after a month of daily use. The handles stay cool to the touch, which is a significant safety feature, especially when juggling multiple pots and pans on the stove.Non-Stick PerformanceOne of the most important features, of course, is the nonstick surface. Whether I'm cooking eggs, stir-frying vegetables, or searing meat, the food slides right off the pan. It's a breeze to cook with and even easier to clean up. Just a quick wipe with a paper towel or rinse under the tap, and it's ready for the next use.Heat DistributionThe heat distribution is quite even, which allows for consistent cooking. I've not experienced any hot spots that cause uneven cooking or scorching. It heats up fairly quickly too, saving me time during busy meal prep.DurabilityWhile it's only been a month, the Cook N Home set has endured daily use without any signs of wear and tear. The lids fit securely, and the riveted handles are robust, providing a comfortable grip when cooking.ExtrasThe set comes with a range of sizes and types of cookware, including a dutch oven, sauté pan, and multiple sizes of frying pans and saucepans. It even includes utensils, which while not top-of-the-line, are a nice addition for those just starting their cookware collection.SummaryOverall, the Cook N Home 02588 Stay Cool Nonstick Cookware Set in Turquoise is a fantastic investment for both novice and experienced cooks. It offers the perfect blend of style, efficiency, and affordability. If you're looking for a cookware set that ticks all these boxes, look no further!
Colour is awesome! Very durable and easy to clean so far. None stick for sure. Would buy these again when and if need new pans.
